itemLabel: James Gordon, Baron Gordon of Strathblane

wikipedia_page.main: James Stuart Gordon, Baron Gordon of Strathblane,  (17 May 1936 – 31 March 2020) was a Scottish business executive and member of the House of Lords.

response: * James Gordon, Baron Gordon of Strathblane (1936–2020), Scottish businessman
